segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, seemingly lost in her task of drying the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s strange how she can’t notice the water spilling over the edges.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle grows larger with each moment, glistening beneath the sunlight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s always so absorbed in her chores.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The chaos happening behind her seems to be entirely invisible to her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy teeters on that stool; I cringe at the thought of him falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching into the cookie jar as if he’s on a quest for treasure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him looks so hopeful with her palm up, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she stand there, blissfully unaware of the disaster brewing?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can only hope the woman turns around in time to see what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
